OOC:  Sorry, got a little ahead of myself.

Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron R=
evived/ Hellplague/ Malice/ Injustice/ 
Necross/ Splattercannon:

Hellplagu=
e reeled back as Rodimus returned fire.  He armor bore the 
brunt of the da=
mage, but it slowed her down for a minute before she 
dived down to engage =
Rodimus in one on one combat.  
"Blacknightmare!  They're a little thick he=
re!  Time for that back 
up!" the Sweep commander called into her comm link=
.

Organics and wolfblade were more or less holding their own with the 
Swe=
eps.  Wolfblade was able to keep ahead of the larger bots and 
blast holes =
in them.  Organics was flying circles around the Sweeps, 
but they kept com=
ing.

Megatron dashed toward a group of Sweeps that had congregated around =

Hydras.  The clone drew his massive sword and charged into the melee, 
eac=
h swing of his sword fell several of Unicron's footsoldiers.  He 
made his =
way close enough to ask the Predacon leader a question:
"Are you well enoug=
h to fight?"

"Let's go!  They need us now!" Malice said as he hung on to 
=
Blacknightmare.
"Yeah, I want a piece of the action too!" Injustice exclaim=
ed, 
wiggling in Nightstrike's grip.
Necross remained in his robot form, si=
lent through the whole ordeal.  
Splattercannon too, remained silent, but w=
anted to go in and shot 
some Maximals full of holes.
